about_the_game:
Step into the enchanting world of Magic and Elements, a captivating 2D arena shooter that puts you in the shoes of the greatest magician of all time. As you embark on this magical adventure, you find yourself facing a series of challenging tests in the Arena of the Four Elements.



Features
  • Elemental Mastery: Harness the power of Fire, Water, Earth, and Air as the greatest magician ever. Strategically wield each element's unique spells to defeat opponents and overcome challenging obstacles.
  • Spell Collection and Customization: Collect a diverse array of offensive and defensive spells throughout the game. Customize your magical arsenal to suit your preferred playstyle, providing a dynamic and engaging gameplay experience.
  • Intense Boss Battles: Face off against formidable Bosses, each specializing in one of the four elements. Utilize your wit and adaptability to outsmart these powerful foes and emerge victorious in epic encounters.
  • Captivating Art and Sound: Immerse yourself in the enchanting world of "Magic and Elements" with visually stunning graphics and an evocative soundtrack. Let the mesmerizing atmosphere elevate your gaming experience.
  • Strategic Challenge: Test your tactical acumen as opponents adeptly counter your elemental attacks. Hone your skills to find the perfect balance between offense and defense, making every level a thrilling test of your magical prowess.
detailed_description:
Step into the enchanting world of Magic and Elements, a captivating 2D arena shooter that puts you in the shoes of the greatest magician of all time. As you embark on this magical adventure, you find yourself facing a series of challenging tests in the Arena of the Four Elements.



Features
  • Elemental Mastery: Harness the power of Fire, Water, Earth, and Air as the greatest magician ever. Strategically wield each element's unique spells to defeat opponents and overcome challenging obstacles.
  • Spell Collection and Customization: Collect a diverse array of offensive and defensive spells throughout the game. Customize your magical arsenal to suit your preferred playstyle, providing a dynamic and engaging gameplay experience.
  • Intense Boss Battles: Face off against formidable Bosses, each specializing in one of the four elements. Utilize your wit and adaptability to outsmart these powerful foes and emerge victorious in epic encounters.
  • Captivating Art and Sound: Immerse yourself in the enchanting world of "Magic and Elements" with visually stunning graphics and an evocative soundtrack. Let the mesmerizing atmosphere elevate your gaming experience.
  • Strategic Challenge: Test your tactical acumen as opponents adeptly counter your elemental attacks. Hone your skills to find the perfect balance between offense and defense, making every level a thrilling test of your magical prowess.
name: Magic and Elements

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP\Vista\7\8\10
  • Processor: 2.3 GHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4000
  • Storage: 40 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 3.0 ghz intel quad core processor
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4000
  • Storage: 40 MB available space

short_description: Magic and Elements is a 2D arena shooter where you, as the greatest magician ever, wield the powers of Fire, Water, Earth, and Air. Defeat skilled opponents, collect spells, and conquer evil Bosses to showcase your mastery of the elements and become the ultimate champion.

English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Arabic*, Bulgarian*, Portuguese - Brazil*, Hungarian*, Vietnamese*, Greek*, Danish*, Spanish - Latin America*, Traditional Chinese*, Simplified Chinese*, Korean*, Dutch*, Norwegian*, Polish*, Portuguese - Portugal*, Romanian*, Russian*, Thai*, Turkish*, Ukrainian*, Finnish*, Czech*, Swedish*, Japanese*, Azerbaijani*, Albanian*, Amharic*, Armenian*, Assamese*, Afrikaans*, Basque*, Belarusian*, Bangla*, Bosnian*, Valencian*, Welsh*, Wolof*, Galician*, Georgian*, Gujarati*, Dari*, Zulu*, Hebrew*, Igbo*, Indonesian*, Irish*, Icelandic*, Yoruba*, Kazakh*, Kannada*, Catalan*, Quechua*, Kinyarwanda*, K'iche'*, Konkani*, Xhosa*, Khmer*, Kyrgyz*, Latvian*, Lithuanian*, Luxembourgish*, Macedonian*, Malay*, Malayalam*, Maltese*, Maori*, Marathi*, Mongolian*, Nepali*, Odia*, Punjabi (Gurmukhi)*, Punjabi (Shahmukhi)*, Persian*, Serbian*, Sotho*, Sinhala*, Sindhi*, Slovak*, Slovenian*, Sorani*, Swahili*, Tajik*, Tamil*, Tatar*, Telugu*, Tigrinya*, Tswana*, Turkmen*, Uzbek*, Uyghur*, Urdu*, Filipino*, Hausa*, Hindi*, Croatian*, Cherokee*, Scots*, Estonian*
